title: Trump crackdown pushes Biden migrants into 'illegal' status
shortDescription: Biden offered humanitarian protections during a period of record migration. Now Trump is revoking their status.

title: Are some of Trump's firings setting up a Supreme Court case?
shortDescription: How much power does the president have? Donald Trump says independent agencies should answer to him.

title: Trump administration revokes all visas held by South Sudanese
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the U.S. is revoking all visas held by South Sudanese passport holders for failing to accept repatriated citizens.

title: 'Dark undertone': For some, Trump policies dent Lady Liberty's promise
shortDescription: Trump says his policies will make the US safer and richer, and preserve American culture and values. Overseas, some are questioning this version of America.

title: Trump tells Americans to 'hang tough' as universal tariffs take effect
shortDescription: President Trump on Saturday urged Americans to "hang tough" and played golf as his baseline 10% universal tariffs went into effect.

title: Anti-Trump protests organize across the world
shortDescription: The “Hands Off” protests across the country are expected to be the largest anti-Trump demonstrations since he began his second term.

title: Trump, Netanyahu to meet Monday to talk Gaza war, tariffs
shortDescription: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu and President Trump will meet Monday at the White house, their second in-person meeting since Trump's inauguration.

title: 'Probably unconstitutional': Trump tariffs spotlight GOP fault lines
shortDescription: Trump's massive tariffs have sparked a debate on the political right but most Republican voters are sticking with the president

title: Rand Paul speaks out against Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: The Kentucky senator is warning fellow Republicans about the political, constitutional consequences of a rising global trade war

title: US starts collecting Trump's new 10% tariff
shortDescription: U.S. customs agents began collecting President Donald Trump's unilateral 10% tariff on all imports from many countries on Saturday.

title: Senate passes blueprint to build Trump's agenda in Congress
shortDescription: The plan must also pass the House before lawmakers can start crafting tax, border and energy policy.

title: Obama on Trump policies: 'Imagine if I had done any of this'
shortDescription: The former president didn't mention Trump by name, but Obama delivered some of his sharpest and clearest criticisms since the 2024 campaign.

title: Protests in towns big and small aimed to show size of Trump opposition
shortDescription: Thousands protested Trump nationwide Saturday against Musk, budget cuts, tariffs; in favor of democracy, immigrants, empathy

title: Trump cancels thousands of 'under the radar' humanities grants
shortDescription: As part of his effort to shrink government, Trump cut humanities grants that have been used to record and share history for a half century

title: How Trump's record pace on executive orders is testing the courts
shortDescription: Trump has set a record with executive orders but also faces unprecedented court rulings blocking policies in scores of clashes called 'emergencies.'

title: Why Trump's attacks on law firms are causing alarm
shortDescription: Even if they are struck down in court, President Trump's executive orders targeting law firms could still succeed in preventing anti-Trump lawsuits.

title: Conspiracy theorist Laura Loomer hints at more Trump 'loyalty' firings
shortDescription: The right-wing provocateur bragged Friday about being behind Trump firings of top national security officials. And she says she's releasing more names.

title: Supreme Court lets Trump halt teacher training grants for now
shortDescription: Congress created the grants in response to a shortage of qualified teachers. Eight Democratic-led states said the grants were improperly terminated.

title: Trump postpones TikTok deal deadline
shortDescription: Trump said his EO will give TikTok's Chinese parent company another 75 days to sell its stake in the social media app or else be banned in the U.S.

title: Who is Laura Loomer? What to know about the activist close to Trump
shortDescription: The conservative conspiracy theorist met with Trump this week before he fired security officials.

title: Trump admin violated court order in pausing FEMA aid, judge says
shortDescription: A federal judge ruled the Trump administration violated a court order by halting millions of dollars in Federal Emergency Management Agency grants.

title: Laura Loomer: Far-right conspiracy theorist and Trump supporter
shortDescription: Laura Loomer, a far-right conspiracy theorist and Trump supporter has lost two Congressional races in Florida.

title: Trump backs the push for new parents to vote by proxy in the House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Thursday said he supports Florida Republican Rep. Anna Paulina Luna’s push to allow new parents to vote by proxy.
